resources.string: Something bad happened. Couldn\'t open file.
Couldn\'t find file. Maybe it doesn\'t exist any longer?
This doesn\'t seem to be a supported file format.
Couldn\'t open file. Only .odt and .ods documents are supported!
Phone out of memory! Too many pictures, or too big file.
External storage not available. Couldn\'t read file.
Only parts of the document are being displayed in order to improve performance. Click here if you want to see the whole document
Choose an app to send us your file
Do you want to send us the file so we can take a look and probably make it work with the next update?
No file explorer found. We recommend one of these:
This could take a few minutes, depending on the structure of your document and the processing power of your phone.
Shape the future of this app!
Don\'t like our approach to monetize this app? Hate the look and feel? Desperately looking for a specific feature? Please tell us about it on our feedback platform!
We aren\'t able to open this document, because we don\'t support its format. Do you want to upload it to our server temporarily, so we can display it for you anyway?
Edit your document below and press Save
Failed to initialize Google Play In-App Billing
Press Back to leave fullscreen mode
Click here to get back to the document view
Searching for documents on your device... This could take some time.
Consuming an ad will remove them for a while. You can also remove them for a small fee
This feature is only available to users who purchased a feature pack. Please purchase one first in the "Feature Store"

string-array.name: remove_ads_options
string-array.item: remove ads forever + support for modifying documents
